item.description:
Hi Incubators, slight change this week but more on that soon.

First off the plate, come check out new show that premieres at IB tomorrow night at 8pm.

Are You Afraid of the Improv!!?? will be an improv show completely in the dark with a creepy Halloween style.
Also it's my first time I've directed a show so come out and see some of your fellow incubators in the show!! Or better yet volunteer and have one of your halloween's retold. The show will be highly audience interactive.

Again here's the details

ImprovBoston 40 Prospect St. Cambridge, MA
$10/$7 for students
8pm

Hope to scare some of you there!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.name: Are You Afraid....of....the Improv!!??
